sentences.sContent: The boy stole a look at his father with grimace.
sentences.sContent_eng: The boy stole a look at his father with grimace.
sentences.sCn: 那男孩扮着鬼脸偷看了他父亲一眼。

sentences.sContent: They have got the doctor in to look at the child.
sentences.sContent_eng: They have got the doctor in to look at the child.
sentences.sCn: 他们请医生来给孩子看病。

sentences.sContent: Just look at the airs she's giving herself, looking down her nose at everybody.
sentences.sContent_eng: Just look at the airs she's giving herself, looking down her nose at everybody.
sentences.sCn: 你看她的神气， 简直是目中无人。
